tool_description: Simple, fast, and reliable face recognition api
title: Simple Face Recognition

api_list.name: Face counter
Face landmark
Add face to list
List of all saved faces
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-face-recognition.p.rapidapi.com/list"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-face-recognition.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-face-recognition.p.rapidapi.com/recognition"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-face-recognition.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
